title: Normal Wins & Losses
body: Is there any way for someone to look up another person's wins & losses for normals? I'm just curious..read that there were stuff that does this in the past. Just wondering if there's still any way for one to obtain the info.

replies.body: Why would you want to look at someone else's win/loss ratio for normals?

Nah it's cause I was thinking of playing hard to get more wins than losses. And cause of that I tend to only use a few champs. But if there is no way for someone else to see my wins or losses, then idrc anymore
Because it's the life of us unranko.
